task.summary: created docker compose for kafka + tested creating a topic
implemented serialization and desarialization of both the consumer and the producer- && added a service and a controller layer, the controller has a post handler that acts as a producer
added a postgresql on docker compose && added an alert table, and a controller

Add full Kafka integration test, alert DTO, and controller test and logs
- Introduced a complete integration test covering the main data flow from Kafka message production to its consumption and processing by the consumer service. - Used Testcontainers to spin up isolated Kafka and PostgreSQL instances for portable, environment-independent testing. - Fixed a critical race condition on test startup by synchronizing the test thread with the Kafka listener using a `@BeforeEach` block, `KafkaListenerEndpointRegistry`, and Awaitility.
- Added Alert DTO. - Added and tested AlertController.
implemented jwt authenticaion with spring security
imeplemented tests for the new controllers
changed code for a M to M approach in the db, configures redis
added domain event pattern and integration tests for the alert controller
completed the testing of the alert controller and the interaction with redis
changed the keys and values format, and added users suscription in redis
solved bugs in tests. added message queues, idempotence and DLQ
refactorized kafka consumer and started implementing websockets for notification
implementing websockets and redis pub sub
implementing more robust controller responses, error handling. and rewriting some tests
